President Bush . He served as Defense secretary and chief of staff to Gerald Ford and again led the Pentagon during the second President Bush presidency. Donald Rumsfeld was unapologetic about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the Barack Obama Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said. As in his book, Donald Rumsfeld was forthcoming with his criticism of public figures, including his fellow President Bush Cabinet members. He drove me crazy," Doc Rivers , Orlando's first-year coach, said. We didn't want to trap him, and it nearly cost us. We told the guys if we could stop the other four, we could win the game. York companies could take advantage of the R&D credit, which if it is made permanent, could increase private investment in R&D by more than$ 7.5 billion across the country, according to Senator Kirsten Gillibrand . My number one focus is on creating good-paying, family-supporting jobs. By supporting research and development, we can help our businesses become more competitive and create the high tech jobs of tomorrow, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand said. "New York is already home to the universities, businesses, laboratories, researchers and the bright minds we need for long-term economic strength.
